name: Megillion
overview:
Art and Science is what you usually find behind every success. In marketing; Art is the idea, the brand and the campaign concept. The science is the technology that measures, delivers and serves your idea to the right people at the right time for the most value. Translating your business goals into effective Art and Science is what we do, by using the science of digital marketing so you can make the most of every digital pound in any medium, from the web to mobile phones anywhere in the world.

Megillion is an integrated digital marketing and information technology agency offering online and offline digital services. We are specified in bringing international design standards, the top of the current technology options and strategic cross-platform marketing to the Middle East.

Megillion’s specialties are:

  • Web Design & Development
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Digital Marketing & Advertizing
  • Social Media
  • Webmastering
  • Online Research & Strategy
  • Digital Project Management
